# Code of Conduct

## Our Standards

This project is committed to providing a welcoming and productive environment for everyone. We expect all participants to:

- **Be respectful** - Treat others with courtesy and professionalism
- **Be constructive** - Focus on helpful feedback and solutions
- **Stay on topic** - Keep discussions relevant to the project
- **Assume good intent** - Give others the benefit of the doubt

## Unacceptable Behavior

The following behaviors are not tolerated:

- Harassment, insults, or personal attacks
- Disruptive or off-topic behavior
- Publishing others' private information without permission

## Reporting Issues

If you experience or witness unacceptable behavior, please report it by opening an issue on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/blasthappy82/Inventory_Analytics_Suite/issues) or contacting the maintainers directly.

Reports will be reviewed and addressed appropriately.

## Enforcement

Maintainers may remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, and other contributions that violate this code of conduct. Repeated violations may result in temporary or permanent bans from participation.

## Scope

This code of conduct applies to all project spaces, including issues, pull requests, and discussions.
